forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms this morning, overcast during the afternoon with occasional rain. High 12C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early then thundershowers for the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms likely. Low 7C. WSW winds shifting to ENE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms. Low around 45F. WSW winds shifting to ENE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 13C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 56F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 4C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 42F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High around 55F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 48F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 16C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 12C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. Low 54F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 59F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 45F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 58F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
